meanings.sent1: The friends mutualized their toys to play together.
meanings.sent2: The siblings mutualized their allowance to buy a gift for their parents.
meanings.sent3: The neighbors mutualized their gardening tools for a community project.
meanings.sent4: The team mutualized their skills to achieve a common goal.
meanings.sent5: The students mutualized their notes to study for the exam together.

meanings.definition: To convert into a mutual company or organization
meanings.sent1: The business owners mutualized their individual companies to form a stronger entity.
meanings.sent2: The insurance company mutualized its structure to benefit policyholders.
meanings.sent3: The farmers mutualized their resources to create a cooperative for better profits.
meanings.sent4: The employees mutualized their workplace to ensure fair treatment for all.
meanings.sent5: The community mutualized their services to improve overall well-being.
